In particular looking at the techniques and methodologies employed in risk estimation and their strengths and weaknesses including their relationship to regulation and capital.

3312bf4b-ab47-42c9-88a2-d921765c243d.description: Earners of this badge have attended this course and obtained a deep dive into the strategic context behind modern financial statement analysis. They have learned how to analyse accounts and how to interpret them through ratio, cash flow and liquidity analysis. They can now combine analysis with the ability to value a company and determine value drivers and build the value bridge. They can use the financial statements as a decisions support process rather than merely a set of historical numbers.
3312bf4b-ab47-42c9-88a2-d921765c243d.name: IFF: Financial Statement Analysis and Valuation Training Course - Attendee

487309c5-f6f5-401e-91ea-2743914abd11.description: Earners of this badge have attended this course and have obtained a deep dive into infrastructure project finance. They have covered in detail the qualitative analysis of project risk as well as the quantitative analysis and debt sizing/structuring. They have studied project finance documentation from a commercial as well as a legal perspective. Layered onto this attendees have learned the variants of project financing techniques employed in different sub-sectors of the infrastructure/PPP space.
487309c5-f6f5-401e-91ea-2743914abd11.name: IFF: Mastering Infrastructure Project Finance - Attendee

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully completed the IFF 3-day course, Infrastructure Project Finance Training Course.
